title: Reinstalling Firefox
content:
I am currently having problems with my Firefox browser. For example often if I type something into the google search box at the right of the address bar and hit return nothing happens until I go down and select Bing instead of the google setting. Also in hotmail (I am on a desktop) if I go to reply, the original is now ether twice. This does not happen if I use Google browser. But I prefer Firefox as I have used it for years.

My concern is if I delete Firefox and reinstall it, I may lose some of the settings or bookmarks that I have set over the years.

Any suggestions? Please simple as i am old and not computer savvy.

Your help would be so appreciated. I am currently on Firefox 107.0 (64 bit)

Thanks, Anthony
creator: avwood

title: Video Audio Delay
content:
Hello,

When ever trying to watch videos on for example youtube. When the video loads or you pause and play it, there is a ~2 second audio blank period. Video doesn't stutter or anything, just no audio right after loading a video or playing it again after pausing.

Ive tried other video sites also and the same problem occurs there.

This computer is running a intel i3 12th gen with hdmi cable to a sony tv
creator: skyrydder

title: [Bug Report] Issue with twitch chat emotes
content: Reporting this issue here cause i can't find if there's an actual bug report system. This issue seems to only be on firefox, I've tried chrome to see if it does it there and it's all fine. The issue is when you have the better TTV addon you can see custom emotes on twitch and some emotes are animated, the animated emotes sometimes freeze for a split second and lags the chat for the same time. I've disabled all addons on firefox except better TTV to see if other things are causing it, still does it. Made sure to test this on chrome as well with just the one addon.
creator: Skaithakk
